casebody.data:
EASTON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT, petitioner,
v.
B.H., a Minor, By and Through Her Mother, Jennifer HAWK, et al. No. 13-672. Supreme Court of the United States March 10, 2014.

Case below, 725 F.3d 293.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
